name: Aldo_Acorn_Brown_Bonded_Leather_Reclining_Loveseat
description: Don't let the fancy Italian name fool you. The Aldo reclining loveseat is pure 100-percent American-style comfort. This reclining loveseat possesses those subtle details desired for hours of uninhibited indulgence: Ultra smooth acorn toned bonded leather, foam-filled cushions and armrests, dual reclining seats. The Aldo reclining loveseat perfectly blends into all home décor motifs.Set Includes: One (1) loveseatMaterials: Bonded leatherFill Material: 1.8 density foam encased pocked coil unit wrapped in decron fiberFinish: Acorn brownUpholstery Material: Bonded LeatherUpholstery Color: Acorn BrownSeating Comfort: MediumInner Dimensions: 19 inches tall x 22 inches wide x 20 inches deepDimensions: 59 inches length x 39 inches width x 40 inches heightStyleContemporaryMaterialBonded LeatherTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
